description:
This course provides China’s perspective on global climate change. Learn about China’s view of the scientific basis of climate change, the challenges and impact it has on regional climate in China, and the adaptation and mitigation measures for addressing it. 

 本课程从中国的角度介绍全球气候变化。了解中国对气候变化的科学认知，认识气候变化对中国的挑战以及区域气候变化的影响，学习适应与减缓气候变化的措施。

China’s climate policies and actions will be presented as well as an interpretation of China’s Intended Nationally Determined Contributions (INDC) and the co-benefits of ambitious climate actions relating to energy security, environmental protection and sustainable development.

介绍中国应对气候变化的政策与行动，对中国国家自主贡献（INDC）进行解读，阐述中国有雄心的气候变化行动与能源安全、环境保护以及可持续发展之间的协同效益。

Special note: This course will be available during the 21st session of the Conference of the Parties to the UNFCCC (COP 21), known as the 2015 Paris Climate Conference.

特别说明：本课程将在《联合国气候变化框架公约》第21次缔约方大会（COP21), 即2015年巴黎气候大会期间开设。
title: 00460032x: China’s Perspective on Climate Change | 应对气候变化的中国视角
instructors: Jiankun He, Yong Luo, Fei Teng, Xiliang Zhang, Zheng Li and Kebin He
